Powers -- Female Human Legendary Thief
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d6 Strength: d4 Vigor: d12
Skills (18 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d12
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d12+1
Gambling: (sma) d6 Psionics: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Thief: +1 Athletics (urban climbing)/+1 Stealth (urban)/+1 Thievery
Holy Symbol: May reroll Faith when holding holy symbol
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 20; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (11 points): Arcane Background (Cleric (Cold Domain)): 1; Arcane Background (Cleric (Justice Domain)): 1; Arcane Background (Cleric (Knowledge Domain)): 1; Arcane Background (Druid): 1; Followers: 1; New Powers: 1; Power Points: 4; Thief: 1 Hindrances: Arcane Sensitivity; Driven; Poverty; Shamed Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Cleric): Has Holy Symbol and Vow+ features
Arcane Background (Druid): Has Armor Interference, Material Components+, One With Nature, Vow+, and Wilderness Stride features
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Followers: Has 5 soldier followers
Poverty: Starts with half funds, loses half funds each wk
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Vow+: Has tight restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Cloak With Hood Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Sickle (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0); Whip (d4+d4)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Arcane Sensitivity: -2 to resist powers
Whip Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Wilderness Stride: Suffers no movement penalty for difficult ground in natural terrain
Arcana
Power Count: 12 Power Points: 40
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP) R6" Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Banish: (3 PP) R6" Target suffers Shaken (Raise 1 wound), returns to native plane if incapacitated (Spirit neg)
Barrier: (2 PP) R6" Creates a 5" long by 1" high wall for 5 rd (+1 PP Barrier inflicts 2d4 damage; +1 PP Barrier has +2 hardness; +2 PP Shapes barrier; +1 PP Creates 10"x2" barrier)
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP) R6" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min (+1 PP Target can use beast's senses)
Blast: (3 PP) R12" 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+1 PP 3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6))
Blessing: (10 PP) Rundefined" 1 hr ritual gives increases crops, health, and prosperity in area
Blind: (2 PP) R6" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Vigor-2)
Bolt: (1 PP) R12" Inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6))
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP) R6" Target gains +1 trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step each rd) (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Burrow: (2 PP) R6" Allows target to merge into earth for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows merging into stone)
Burst: (2 PP) R9" Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6))
Confusion: (1 PP) R6" Target suffers Distracted and Vulnerable for 1 rd (Smarts neg (Raise Smarts-2)) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Conjure Item: (2 PP) R6" 1 hr process creates 2 lb (+1 PP/additional lb) mundane item for 1 hr (+1 PP Complete set; +1 PP/lb Daily food; +1 PP/lb Lasts until dispelled)
Damage Field: (4 PP) R6" Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage for 5 rd (+2 PP 2d6 damage)
Darksight: (1 PP) R6" Target ignores 4 points (Raise 6 points) of illumination penalties for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target)
Deflection: (3 PP) R6" Foes suffer -2 attacks (Raise -4) on target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Detect/Conceal Arcana: (2 PP) R6" Target can detect supernatural effects for 5 rd or conceals target aura for 1 hr (Detect neg) (+1 PP/additional target; +1/+2 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Detect-2)
Disguise: (2 PP) R6" Target assumes another's appearance for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows changing size by 2 steps)
Dispel: (1 PP) R6" Ends targeted power (Arcane skill neg, +2 if types differ) (+1 PP Disrupts magic item for 1 rd (Raise 2 rd))
Divination: (5 PP) RSelf 5 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information
Drain Power Points: (2 PP) R6" Drains 1d6 Power Points (Raise adds drained Power Points to self) (Spirit neg, +2 if types differ)
Elemental Manipulation: (1 PP) R6" Self performs minor elemental manipulation for 5 rd
Empathy: (1 PP) R6" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gains +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2; Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Entangle: (2 PP) R6" Restrains target (Raise binds; Athletics or breaking Hardness 5 frees) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Athletics-2, Hardness 7)
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) R6" Target gains protection from hazards for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target)
Farsight: (2 PP) R6" Target sees up to 1 mile for 5 rd (Raise halves range penalties) (+1 PP/additional target)
Fear: (2 PP) R6" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Fly: (3 PP) R6" Target gains fly Pace 12 (Raise Pace 24) for 5 rd (+2 PP/additional target)
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP) R6" Target gains or loses Toughness and Strength step (Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Havoc: (2 PP) R6" Distracts and throws creatures in 2" radius or 9" cone 2d6" (Strength neg) (+1 PP 3" radius; +1 PP Strength-2)
Healing: (3 PP) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older wound; +20 PP Heals crippling injury; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Illusion: (3 PP) R6" Creates 2" radius visual illusion (Smarts neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP Illusion includes sound; +2 PP Smarts-2)
Intangibility: (5 PP) R6" Target becomes unaffected by physical world for 5 rd (Spirit neg)
Invisibility: (5 PP) R6" Target becomes invisible, foes -4 sight-based actions (Raise -6) for 5 rd (+3 PP/additional target)
Light/Darkness: (2 PP) R6" Creates 3" radius bright light or darkness for 10 min (+1 PP Attaches to object or moves effect 4"/rd)
Locate: (3 PP) RSelf Gives direction of chosen item (-2 if self has never seen item, running water blocks) for 10 min (+1 PP Self learns best path to target)
Lock/Unlock: (1 PP) R6" Inflicts -4 to open (Raise seals shut) on target item or opens target item, ignoring 4 points of penalties (Raise disarms alarms and traps) (+1 PP Alerts self if unlocked)
Lower Trait: (2 PP) R6" Target suffers -1 trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step each rd) (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Mind Link: (1 PP) R6" Two targets communicate up to 1 mile telepathically (Raise 5 miles) for 30 min (+1 PP/additional target)
Mind Reading: (2 PP) R6" Self gains 1 truthful answer from target (Smarts neg)
Mind Wipe: (3 PP) R6" Target forgets up to 30 min event (Smarts neg) after 1 min activation (+1 PP Edits memory; +2 PP Activate power as an action)
Mystic Intervention: (20 PP) Rundefined" Ritual causes great event
Object Reading: (2 PP) RTouch Self sees five yr of events that occurred w/in 10 yd of target (Raise 100 yr and 20 yd) (+2 PP Self sees events beginning with target creation)
Planar Binding: (8 PP) R6" Summons extraplanar creature to perform service (Spirit neg)
Plane Shift: (4 PP) R6" Self travels to chosen plane, w/in 10d10 miles of known location (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Creates extra-dimensional shelter; +2 PP Plane shifts foe (Spirit neg) for 3 rd (Raise 5 rd))
Protection: (1 PP) R6" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP +4 Armor (Raise +6); +1 PP Target gains Toughness instead of Armor)
Puppet: (3 PP) R6" Target obeys self (Raise complete control) for 5 rd (Spirit neg) (+2 PP/additional target)
Relief: (1 PP) R6" Target recovers 1 fatigue level or Shaken (Raise 2 levels or Stunned) (+1 PP/additional target)
Resurrection: (30 PP) RTouch Successful -8 casting roll returns 1 yr corpse to life with 3 wounds and 2 fatigue (Raise 0 wounds) (+5 PP Raises 10 yr corpse)
Sanctuary: (2 PP) RTouch Evil creatures cannot attack target (Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Scrying: (3 PP) RSelf Self sees chosen target (-2 unfamiliar target, Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP Shares vision with allies in 6" radius)
Shape Change: (3+ PP) RSelf transforms into animal form for 5 rd (+1 PP Allows speech while changed)
Sloth/Speed: (2 PP) R6" Target gains dbl Pace for 5 rd or suffers half Pace (Spirit ends) (+1 PP/additional target; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Reduces target multi-action penalty by 2; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Slumber: (2 PP) R6" Target sleeps for 1 hr (Spirit neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Smite: (2 PP) R6" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Sound/Silence: (1 PP) R30" Creates sound up to shout (Smarts neg) or R6" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd (+1 PP Moves effect 4"/rd; 1 PP/target (Spirit neg))
Speak Language: (1 PP) R6" Target speaks unknown language for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target)
Stun: (2 PP) R6" Stuns target (Vigor neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Summon Ally: (2+ PP) R6" Creates obedient servant for 5 rd (+1 PP Servant can bite/claw for Str+d6 damage; +2 PP Servant has fly Pace 12; +1 PP Self can use servant's senses)
Summon Animal: (Special PP) R6" Brings chosen animal type to perform task for 5 rd (+Half PP Additional animals; +1 PP Increased Trait; +1 PP Mind Rider)
Summon Monster: (Special PP) R6" Brings chosen monster type to perform task for 5 rd (+Half PP Additional monsters; +1 PP Increased Trait; +1 PP Mind Rider)
Summon Undead: (Special PP) R6" Brings chosen undead type to perform task for 5 rd (+Half PP Additional undead; +1 PP Increased Trait; +1 PP Mind Rider)
Telekinesis: (5 PP) R12" Moves items remotely as Strength d10 (Raise d12) for 5 rd (Spirit neg)
Teleport: (2 PP) R6" Target teleports 12" (Raise 24") (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Touch teleports foe (Spirit neg))
Time Stop: (10 PP) RSelf Self gains additional turn
Wall Walker: (2 PP) R6" Target moves at half Pace (Raise full Pace) on vertical and inverted surfaces for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) R6" Target gains combat edge effects for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Wish: (20 PP) R6" Self alters reality, loses 3 PP permanently (Raise neg loss)
Zombie: (3 PP) R6" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr or store PP for permanent (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Target is armed; +1 PP Target has 2 Armor points; +1 PP Self can use target senses)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Cleric): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Druid): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +20 Power Points
Armor Interference: -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features in medium or heavy armor
Material Components+: -4 arcane skill rolls when materials unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
One With Nature: Summon Animal and Shape Change (natural animal) last 1 hr
